message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you, even at that price.
I'm getting closer to what I'm looking for, but I still think $170 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $145. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
